Description: Terracotta model coffin(no lid); inside is a pottery mummiform figure of Osiris wearing the atef and holding the crook and flail and resting on a bed of linen.
Curator's comments: Published: N. Strudwick, The Legacy of Lord Carnarvon, Wyoming 2001, p. 27 [16].
Exhibition history: Exhibited: 1989 Jun-Sep, Swaffham Museum, Wonderful Things! The Howard Carter Exhibition
Acquisition name: Donated by: George Herbert, 5th Earl of Carnarvon
